plot: A compelling portrait of the NYC Horse Carriage debate which features the inside perspective of the horse drivers and owners in their political battle to save their profession.
title: Save NYC Horse Carriages
plot_es: A compelling portrait of the NYC Horse Carriage debate which features the inside perspective of the horse drivers and owners in their political battle to save their profession.
plot_en: A compelling portrait of the NYC Horse Carriage debate which features the inside perspective of the horse drivers and owners in their political battle to save their profession.
